settings.title: Our Story
settings.content: Steeped in tradition and classics, EP Pro was founded in 1995 as a premier women’s Golf brand.  Looking forward to our 25th Anniversary – a tremendous accomplishment indeed - It has been our goal to dress the classic woman who loved the game of golf, loved the social aspects of golf, and the spirit of the game itself – all while looking great.  Our goal has held steadfast for over 25 years.

settings.title: All In The Family
settings.content: As our history evolves we are constantly reminded of the true meaning behind the E and P of our brand - Resonating throughout our creative process are the words – Empowered, Performance, Energized, Playful, Enthusiastic, Expressive, Personable, Excellence, Powerful.  These are the words that we consider with every color chosen, every polo designed, every fabric tested, every trim identified and every style fit.  EP NY brings the ultimate in sports apparel with function, style, detail and authenticity.
